text: John Mahoney (June 20, 1940 - February 4, 2018) was an American-British actor. He was known for his role as Martin Crane in the sitcom Frasier which ran from 1993 to 2004. Mahoney was born in Blackpool, Lancashire, England. He became an American citizen in 1959. Mahoney died on 4 February 2018 while in hospice care in Chicago, Illinois of complications from epilepsy and lung and throat cancer at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1940 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from throat cancer Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Deaths from epilepsy Category:Cancer deaths in Chicago Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Actors from Blackpool Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Tony Award winning actors
title: John Mahoney
